text: 'in almnqadyn lawamr allah walmnqadat, walmsaddiqyn walmsddiqat walmtyeyn lilah warasulih walmtyeat, walsaadiqin fi 'aqwalahum walsadqat, walsaabirin ean alshahawat waealaa altaeat waealaa almkarh walsabrat, walkhayfyn min allah walkhayfat, walmutasadiqin balfrd walnnafl walmtsdqat, walsaayimin fi alfrd walnnafl walsaymat, walhafizin furujahum ean alzna wmqdmath, waean kashf alewrat walhafzat, waldhaakirin allah kthyrana bqlwbhm wa'alsinatahum waldhakrat, aedd allah lhwla' maghfirat lidhunubihim wthwabana ezymana, wahu aljnt
